entry.title: Situation Handling: Error during related app Navigation
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I have configured a situation case for Purchase order down payment through situation handling in S4/HANA Public Cloud.

✅ Steps Performed

  1. Created Situation Object
    • Developed a custom situation object relevant to Purchase Order Down Payment Monitoring.

2.Configured Situation Scenario

    • Created a new situation scenario using the Manage Situation Scenarios app.
    • Defined key parameters, business context, and UI navigation details.

3.Developed Situation Template

    • Used the Create Situation Template function to define the logic and structure.
    • Included relevant parameters and event triggers to be reused across situation types.

4.Created Situation Type

  • Responsible users or roles.
  • Navigation target: set to Monitor Down Payment App.
  • Notification settings.
  • Triggers (event-based and batch-based).
    • Created the situation type using the Manage Situation Types - Extended app.
    • Configured the following:

  1. Observed Behavior
    • The situation is successfully triggered and notifications are received.
    • However, navigating from the notification to the target app is not working.
    • The app does not launch or errors out when attempting to access the Monitor Down Payment app from the notification link.

⚠️ Issue Summary

  • Triggering Behavior:
    • ✅ Batch-based triggering: Working as expected.
    • ❌ Event-based triggering: Not working (no situation instance is triggered).
  • Navigation Issue:
    • Notifications are sent correctly to users.
    • However, clicking the link in the notification fails to open the Monitor Down Payment app.
    • The navigation link either breaks or shows a message preventing access.

      Can you please suggest any solution for this case?

      Situation Handling SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

entry.title: SAP S4 HANA Cloud - oAuth 2.0 with Scopes

We are using a Replication Model for Business Partners and want to send the payload directly to MS Power Platform.

Therefore we need to add a Scope for getting the token from the token endpoint.

I cant find any fields in the communication system where i can configure the Scopes:

I would appreciate any tips on this topic 🙂

Thanks in Advance.

Simon

entry.title: How to generate Payment advise if payment done by app -post outgoing payment in SAP Public Cloud 25
entry.content:
I am currently not using the F110 app in the SAP Public Cloud 2508 system. Instead of the Automatic Payment Program, I processed a manual payment to the vendor/supplier using the Post Outgoing Payment app.

Now, I need to generate a Payment Advice for this specific document, but I am unable to do so. I have tried using the Manage Payment Advices app, but the issue persists.

Could you please assist me in resolving this matter?

@paymentadvise

entry.title: Restricting changes in Budget or Notifications

Is there any possibility to have approval workflow, events, situation handling or notifications to identify changes in budget once released or uploaded first time.

Processes:

  1. Budget by Cost Center - CO Module
  2. Project Budget Supplement and Transfer during budget adjustment. PS Module

Please, any kind of example that you use in your projects to do the configurations would also be appreciated.

entry.title: In S/4 Public Cloud with function substitutes the program RFWT0010 ?
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We are facing the problem below with  withholding tax in Cloud Public . in SAP ECC we have the program RFWT0010 that corrects the open items and we can go on with the daily activities 

How can we correct the open itens in Public Cloud to continue working ?

Thanks

Lilian Margonari

 

1 items have not been activated due to inconsistent withholding tax info

Message no. F5787

Diagnosis

The open items display different withholding tax information from the relevant business partner master record. For example, the number of withholding tax types in the open item could differ from the number of withholding tax types in the master record.

entry.title: How does budget control work?
entry.content:

I'm looking for a scope item or document that will help me understand how budget control works and how it is configured in S/4Hana Public Cloud.
I would like to understand how the different modules consume the available budget.

 

Thanks,

Fernando.

entry.title: Feasibility – Fixed HU per Material, Bin Replenishment & Direct PSA Consumption
entry.content:
We would like to clarify and/or configure the following business requirement in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition – Warehouse Management:

  1. Dedicated HU for a Specific Material

    • Is it possible to assign a specific material to a fixed Handling Unit (HU), e.g., a pallet or container, so that this material is always packed/stored in the same HU type or even the same HU ID?

  2. Replenishment for that HU

    • Can we apply a replenishment strategy specifically for that HU (rather than generally for a bin), so that the HU is kept filled automatically and can be staged directly for production use?

  3. Direct Consumption from that HU in Production

    • If the HU is staged to the Production Supply Area (PSA), can we directly consume the material from this HU for a production order?

    • How is the HU identified in the consumption process?

  4. Pre-stocking PSA without a Production Order

    • Can we move and store a full HU with material in the PSA without having a production order, and then consume from it later whenever required for production?

entry.title: Delivery group functionality in Sales order item level is not Working.

Based on values when i tried to create outbound delivery, system should create two outbound deliveries but system is creating single outbound delivery and not considering delivery group (VBAP-GRKOR) field value in delivery split.

Please help if any has faced this issue and fixed it.

Regards

XXXX

entry.title: edocument hungary - Validation Warning from NAV /SAP Error EDOCUMENT_HU_INV004
entry.content:
Dear All,

we have the following challenge regards the Transmission of einvoices in HU and the validation at the NAV portal. 

EDOCUMENT_HU_INV004

  • WARN / INCORRECT_SUMMARY_CALCULATION_INVOICE_NET_A
  • WARN / INCORRECT_SUMMARY_CALCULATION_VAT_RATE_NET_
  • WARN / INCORRECT_SUMMARY_DATA_VAT_PERCENTAGE

In SAP itself we only find 99308 HUF for the Line Item Sum (in this example there is only one line item), the invoice total and the product price sum (qty x price). However in NAV 99307HUF are shown as reported for the Line Item Sum? Any ideas how to fix in the Public Cloud DRC. The warning occurs for almost all documents issued to NAV:

Many thanks,

Sebastian

entry.content:

We are using the SAP managed integration between S4 and Sales Cloud of SAP Grow Premium for other replications like BusinessPartner and Product etc... 

For on-prem S4 there is an dedicated Employee replication integration flow, but in the S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition integration content there is no such flow.

 

Thanks in advance and kind regards,

Niklas

entry.title: Managing Subscriptions in S/4HANA Public Cloud as a software reseller
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

One of our main business activities is reselling subscription-based software from a large software OEM. We are currently exploring SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud with a fit-to-standard approach and are looking for the optimal way to manage and bill our subscriptions.

We have been advised to look into several possible approaches, including:

  • SAP Subscription Billing
  • Service Contracts
  • Recurring WBS items in Projects
  • Sales Orders
  • Solution Orders

SAP Subscription Billing seems to be an obvious candidate, but it appears to be more suited for companies selling their own subscriptions with usage-based rate plans or complex pricing schemes. The setup seems like an overkill for our business processes with a more complicated process to create and manage subscriptions than necessary for us. The standard setup without using Solution Orders also allows you to only create 1 subscription at a time while we want to manage and create subscription contracts that contain multiple different products. 

In our use case we just have a order from a client with multiple products, each with its own quantity, subscription term and annual price that we would need to enter into SAP, prepare the billing on an annual/quarterly/monthly basis and make sure the revenue is recognized across the subscription term per day. 

We need a simple, user-friendly solution that allows us to:

  • Manage multiple subscriptions under a single customer contract
  • Define subscription terms and pricing per license line
  • Automate annual billing and revenue recognition
  • Match the revenue of the subscription with the purchase cost for margin calculation
  • Provide accurate KPI insights such as MRR and churn

Is there anyone in this community with a similar business model as subscription software reseller on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud? I would be very interested to hear your experiences and which solution you chose for managing and billing subscriptions.

Thanks,
Vasco

SAP Subscription Billing SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
